StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_DBAUpdateTourEndDate]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ssn varchar(9), @tour_end_date date.me AS
update recrui.ng_person set user_login=le.(SUSER_SNAME(),15), update_date=getdate(), tour_end_date=@tour_end_date where recrui.ng_person_id=(select person_id from person where social_security_number=@ssn)
